Featured-image: CK28-royal-mock-two-piece-prom-evening-dress-with-full-princess-skirt_p.jpg

Description: A mock two piece is created with illusion sheer fabric at the waistline and lower back. A high neckline with capped sleeves are adorned with beading and sequins. The full princess ball gown skirt is satin with a trimmed waistline. Pockets are featured as well.
